p: Carvone and limonene are two major components of oil, which account for 95% of essential oil compounds. According to European Pharmacopeia, caraway fruit should contain 3% essential oil with d-carvone (50â€“65%), and (+)-limonene (up to 45%) as main components and it contains less than 1.5% carveol and dihydrocarveol. d-carvone as the main component of caraway [ 23] is responsible for caraway odor reminiscent [ 24].
